issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Application (Attempt and Container) Not Found in AHS results in Internal Server Error (500)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Both RM and ATS REST API are affected. And the weird thing is that it only happens with 404, but not other error code, and it only happens with xml, but not json. {code} zshens-mbp:Deployment zshen$ curl -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "Content-Type:application/xml" http://localhost:8188/ws/v1/applicationhistory/apps/application_1432863609211_0001 Error 500 STREAM

HTTP ERROR 500

Problem accessing /ws/v1/applicationhistory/apps/application_1432863609211_0001. Reason: 

    STREAM

Caused by:
